title: 5 steps for League game preparation.
body:
Hello, this is my guide to prepare for a league game.

Step1. Make sure you go to the toilet before you que up. 

Step2. Having a good connection is always a bonus, close down any programs that take bandwidth.

Step3. If you play ranks, preferably do it when you know you don't have anything to attend to.

Step4. Clear all distractions. Such as girlfriend/Pets/Noises.

Step5.  Stock up on snacks and drinks so you don't have to duck out and make a feast.

I hope these simple steps will improve the gameplay for every LoLer.
